channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:33 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 23:33 Air alert in Kyiv region. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 23:11 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Pokrovsk territorial community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 23:11 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Pokrovsk territorial community. Take shelter! #Покровська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
